LanguageData.GotHugged.stages.0.label: got hugged
LanguageData.GotHugged.stages.0.description: It's nice to know someone cares about me.
LanguageData.ChildDied.stages.0.label: a child died
LanguageData.ChildDied.stages.0.description: A child died. I can't believe this is happening.
LanguageData.CryingBaby.stages.0.label: crying baby
LanguageData.CryingBaby.stages.0.description: There's a screaming baby in the vicinity. It's not a pleasant noise.
LanguageData.CryingBaby.stages.1.label: crying babies
LanguageData.CryingBaby.stages.1.description: There's multiple screaming babies near me. Make it stop!
LanguageData.CryingBaby.stages.2.label: crying babies
LanguageData.CryingBaby.stages.2.description: I'm surrounded by a horde of air-raid sirens in miniature human form! Kill me now!!!
